main_text.sentence: SV40 large T is a powerful oncoprotein capable of transforming a variety of cell types [42].
Peculiarity of cervical carcinomas is due to the ability of HPV oncoprotein E7 to interact with pRb and inactivate it [19].
Accordingly, we explain the non-immunogenicity of tumor-associated-antigens as due to high level of similarity of oncoprotein sequences to self-proteome [8,9,12].
Prominent among them are the early adenoviral E1A antigen [10,11], Epstein-Barr virus protein EBNA-2 [12], and human T-cell leukemia virus oncoprotein Tax [13,14].
